channel.title: Forms
channel.description:
Yes, Oh my god!; Me, asking a Forms question! Interviews and Confrences later, i need this answered asap.
I'm using a TListBox for something i'm creating (Almost finished). I want it to Display what text the user clicked into an Edit box.
I have:
[scar] procedure Update(sender: TObject); begin Configure.Text:= Dictionary.Items.{WhatGoesHere..} end; [/scar]
In other words: There will be a list of words. I want it to display the one clicked in the Configure Edit box. :)
I've never had to do this until now. So baha, My excuse for not knowing.
[img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/2457/hehemo7.jpg[/img]
<3 Kane.

item.title: Forms
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Yes, Oh my god!; Me, asking a Forms question! Interviews and Confrences later, i need this answered asap.

I’m using a TListBox for something i’m creating (Almost finished). I want it to Display what text the user clicked into an Edit box.

I have:

[scar]
procedure Update(sender: TObject);
begin
Configure.Text:= Dictionary.Items.{WhatGoesHere…}
end;
[/scar]

In other words: There will be a list of words. I want it to display the one clicked in the Configure Edit box.

I’ve never had to do this until now. So baha, My excuse for not knowing.

<3 Kane.

Read full topic
